title: Turtle Race
description: A Python Turtle graphics game where multiple turtles race across the screen using random movements to determine the winner.

title: Lemonoid
description: A physics-based Scratch game where players control a spaceship to blast meteorites in the shape of lemons.

title: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
description: A quiz game inspired by the TV show Who Wants To Be A Millionaire, built in Scratch with multiple-choice questions, lifelines, and scoring managed through Scratch variables and broadcasts.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: The classic Rock Paper Scissors game implemented in Scratch, using sprite costumes for choices and random number blocks to simulate the computer's move.
